Package hillbillies.model.unit

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Activity
    The abstract base class for all activities, providing shared methods.
    AttackActivity
    The activity for attacking another unit.
    FallActivity
    The activity for falling, is a subclass of MoveActivity.
    FollowActivity
    The activity for following another unit.
    MoveActivity
    The activity for moving to either a distant cube or a neighbour.
    NoneActivity
    The default activity for when an unit isn't doing anything, also manages default behaviour.
    RestActivity
    The activity for resting.
    Unit
    The unit class, this class keeps tracks of the unit's position, speed and other attributes.
    WorkActivity
    The activity for working.
